ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) Annex A (normative) Tailoring process A.1 Introduction This Annex provides requirements for the tailoring of this document. NOTE 1 Tailoring is not a requirement for conformance to this document. In fact, tailoring is not permitted if a claim of “full conformance” is to be made. If a claim of “tailored conformance” is made, then this process is applied to perform the tailoring. NOTE 2 Additional guidance for tailoring
